name: The Gallery: Six Elements
blurb: "Cross over into painted worlds and unravel the mystery of The Gallery, an immersive first-person adventure for the Oculus Rift"

rewards.reward:
THE WATCHER
=============================
You would like to see the game thrive but you are too busy building your own dreams. You'll receive newsletter access and project updates for your kind support.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
All tiers include access to The Gallery community forums, where backers will have a chance to join in on game development discussions.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A set of high resolution desktop wallpapers.

THE DREAMER
=============================
Digital download of the release ready game. DRM-free for PC w/digital manual. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
and all previous reward tiers.

THE SCOUT
=============================
Early access to Episode #1 beta content (August 2013). 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
and all previous reward tiers.

EXPLORATION SCHOOL
=============================
Get fast-track, pre-Alpha access (June 2013) to "Exploration School", our virtual playground in an abandoned warehouse! Designed to teach you exploration fundamentals.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Includes custom "Exploration School Graduate" forum icon.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
and all previous reward tiers.

THE EXPLORER
=============================
Sometimes there's nothing better than a game in a box! Get a limited edition, DRM-free copy of The Gallery in a shiny box w/manual. Take it to your friends, have fun!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Includes Episode #1 beta content (August 2013).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You will also receive a custom "Explorer" icon for your forum presence. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
and all previous reward tiers.

THE SPELUNKER ============================= Share it with a friend! Includes 2 Digital downloads of the release ready game. DRM-free for PC w/digital manual. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Digital PDF of the "The Making Of" coffee table book ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive a custom "Spelunker" icon for your forum presence. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ and all previous reward tiers.

THE TRAVELER
=============================
Your name will appear in the game within one of the game environments! Talk about immersion; find the secret you hiding in The Gallery!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Digital PDF of the "The Making Of" coffee table book
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Digital PDF of the Papercraft "Portal Model"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You will also receive a custom "Pioneer" icon for your forum presence. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
and all previous reward tiers.

THE SOJOURNER
=============================
Basic character customization. Emblazon your gear with your last name, modify the color of your clothing, get connected to the virtual you! 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Air World" Poster Print
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Custom "Sojourner" icon with elite copper trim for your forum presence. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
and all previous reward tiers.

THE TRAILBLAZER
=============================
Your name will appear on the closing game credits!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Limited edition Gallery T-shirt. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Complete "6 Elements" poster collection (all 6 worlds)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Custom "Trailblazer" icon with elite copper trim for your forum presence!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
and all previous reward tiers.

THE VANGUARD
=============================
Your name (or business name) featured in the opening credits!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You will also receive a limited edition printing of "The Making Of" coffee table book. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Tangible "Portal" papercraft model kit. Pre-cut, pre-printed!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Custom "Vanguard" icon with elite silver trim for your forum presence. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
and all previous reward tiers.

THE ASCENDENT
========================
A signed thank you portrait from our team and a hand written letter telling you why you are amazing!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Skype chat with Denny Unger to talk shop!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Custom "Ascendent" icon with elite gold trim for your forum presence!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
and all previous reward tiers.

THE ARCHITECT
=============================
EVERY CLOUDHEAD GAMES TITLE RELEASED FOR THE NEXT 10 YEARS
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In-game secret shrine built to honor your support!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Skype chat with Denny Unger to talk shop!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A signed thank you portrait from our team and a hand written letter telling you why you are an amazing person!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Custom "Architect" icon with magic trim for your forum presence!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
and all previous reward tiers.
